computers.title: Personal Everyday PC
computers.desc: This computer is suitable for a person who is a casual computer user and can easily handle internet browsing (facebook, checking emails, occasional solitaire, word processing etc) and would rather not spend too much for something they do not particularly need. If this sounds familiar then this build is for you.

computers.title: Business Computer (mid-range)
computers.desc: This build is more for someone that will be using their computer a lot of the time, mainly for business reasons or something that requires regular use. It's got that 'oompf' that will keep your computer responsive and will prevent any waiting around.

computers.title: Business Computer (high-end)
computers.desc: This computer is built to last. It will get you through most games at the highest quality. Pushing past the boundaries of the business or everyday computer, it will give that satisfying feeling when things load with phenomonal speed. If you are are a casual gamer, a dedicated business person, or you're just sick of the agonisingly slow perfomance of your current set-up, this is the computer for you.

computers.title: Gaming/Multimedia PC
computers.desc: This is for the more enthusiastic gamer, or for someone with some serious multimedia needs. The multi-core design coupled with the newest graphics card on the market will blitz through any rendering you throw at it. The graphics card also supports up to 4 displays simultaneously for that extra real-estate that is often needed for heavy computer use or media editing.

computers.title: Machine Of Death
computers.desc: This baby is not for the faint-hearted. It packs a punch you've never felt before and will continue to do so for many years. Hit it with everything you've got and it will stay standing. If you're that kind of person then by all means, please purchase this from us.

computers.title: Custom PC
computers.desc: Want something truly one of a kind? The custom PC option is for you. Tell us what you're intending to use your computer for as well as your budget, and we'll try our best to quote something to suit.
